title: When you see a Taliyah has the wrong keystone so you go easy on her
body:
http://31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2r5paNl4O1rpgvxuo1_250.gif

But then she keeps harassing you 

http://i.imgur.com/dABY6TA.gif

So you try to engage on her but 

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/71/ca/5d/71ca5da1d58d1bb16e744bb856b2aa12.gif

Then you finally catch her out but she gets honeyfruit plant and makes a turn-around play on you 

http://25.media.tumblr.com/fdb874b4336103e392af382586a612ac/tumblr_mg2mxxeCuh1rzxujso2_r1_500.gif

Then your allied Teemo kills her 

http://i.imgur.com/WkG8Wek.gif

replies.body: Take my upvote for nostalgia. God I miss this show.

When you say "miss" it implies you wish it was still going.

I thought it was the perfect length, sometimes it's better for shows to end good than to stretch long enough to become garbage (ie what spongebob should have done).

I "miss" it due to not having seen it in a long time. And while I don't necessarily wish it was still going, I wish the sequel had been something along the same lines instead of what we got in Legend of Korra. I want more, but I can get more through well written fanfiction (and do so), because it means the show is still nostalgic gold.
I hate Taliyah but I love Avatar. My feelings are conflicted on if I like this post or not.

Ultimately, this post ends in Taliyah getting killed.
The FancyKiwi is over their conflicted feelings.

Just how can you hate Taliyah..

That feel when you're reminded of how disappointing Legend of Korra was. (fite me)
That feel when someone insults an underfunded cartoon network show that could've done better than the original
Except the damage was done by the second season, not the fourth season, which is when _Nickelodeon_ cut their budget.
+1 for one of the best characters in Avatar, and one of my favorite League champs. xD
lul. Love this! Thanks for the fun post :)
